key.name: background-picture-uri
key.summary: Sets the background image for the login screen.
key.description: URI to use for the background image. Note that the backend only supports local (file://) URIs. It overrides the value defined in the default style sheet.

key.name: background-color
key.summary: The background-color property sets the background color.
key.description: The background-color property sets the background color to use when the background picture URI is missing or when it doesn't cover the whole background. It overrides the value defined in the default style sheet.

key.name: background-repeat
key.summary: The background-repeat property sets if/how the background image will be repeated.
key.description:
The background-repeat property sets if/how a background image will be repeated. By default, a background-image is repeated both vertically and horizontally.
It overrides the value defined in the default style sheet.

key.name: background-size
key.summary: The background-size property specifies the size of the background image.
